block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey

Newark Board of Public Utilities. Thursday at 10 a.m. 2 Gateway Center, board hearing room, eighth floor. (973) 648-2026. Trenton Assembly Budget Committee hearing. Tuesday at 10 a.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Senate Budget and Appropriations hearing. Wednesday at 10 a.m. and 2:30 p.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Bergen County

Haworth Mayor and Council. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Haworth Municipal Center, 300 Haworth Avenue. (201) 384-4785. Paramus Mayor and Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Paramus Borough Hall, 1 Jockish Square. (201) 265-2100.
Cumberland County
Vineland Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Vineland City Hall, 640 East Wood Street. (856) 794-4000.
Essex County

BellEville Free podiatry clinic. Wednesday from 9:30 a.m. to 11:30 a.m. Belleville Senior Center, Franklin Avenue and Mill Street. Registration available at (973) 450-3394. Montclair Township Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. 205 Claremont Avenue. (973) 509-4900. Orange Board of Chosen Freeholders. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Orange Town Hall, 617 Orange Center Road. (203) 891-2122.
Hudson County

Bayonne Autism support group. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Bayonne Jewish Community Center, 1050 Kennedy Boulevard. (201) 436-6900. Kearny Mayor and Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Kearny Town Hall, 402 Kearny Avenue. (201) 955-7400.
Mercer County

Princeton Town Council. Monday at 7 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 924-5704. Princeton Housing Board. Tuesday at 5:30 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 924-5704.
Monmouth County

Belmar Borough Council. Wednesday at 8 p.m. Belmar Municipal Building, 601 Main Street. (732) 681-3700. Neptune City Council. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Neptune Municipal Complex, 25 Neptune Boulevard. (732) 988-5200.
Morris County

Madison Zoning Board of Adjustment. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Hartley Dodge Memorial, 50 Kings Road. (973) 593-3060. Morristown Board of Chosen Freeholders. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Administration and Records Building, Court Street. (973) 285-6015. Mount Arlington Mayor and Council. Monday at 7 p.m. Mount Arlington Municipal Building, 419 Howard Boulevard. (973) 398-6832.
Passaic County

Clifton Rent Leveling Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Clifton Municipal Building, 900 Clifton Avenue. (973) 470-5757. Paterson Municipal Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Paterson City Hall, 155 Market Street. (973) 321-1500.
Somerset County
North Plainfield Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. North Plainfield Borough Hall, 263 Somerset Street. (908) 769-2915.
Sussex County

Andover Township Committee. Monday at 8 p.m. Green Township Municipal Building, 150 Kennedy Road. (908) 852-9333. Newton Town Council. Monday at 7 p.m. Newton Municipal Building, 39 Trinity Street. (973) 383-3521. Newton Township Committee. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Stillwater Township Municipal Building, 964 Stillwater Road. (973) 383-9484.
Union County
Cranford Township Committee. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Township of Cranford Municipal Building, 8 Springfield Avenue. (908) 709-7200.
Warren County

Blairstown Township Committee. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Blairstown Municipal Building, 106 Route 94. (908) 362-6663. Phillipsburg Environmental Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Harmony Township Municipal Building, 3003 Belvidere Road. (908) 213-1600. Port Murray Township Committee. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Mansfield Township Municipal Building, 100 Port Murray Road. (908) 689-6151.
